CustomField.description: Field used in the flow to set Customer Stage to Adopting
CustomField.formula: AND( CloseDate >= DATE(2019,8,27), OR(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "New Business"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "Platform Transfer")), Project_Sign_off_Date__c <= TODAY(), Project_Sign_off_Date__c > TODAY() - 90, NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Adopting"),ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Cancelling"),ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Churned"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Auto-Pilot") ) ) )
CustomField.label: Flow: Customer Stage to Adopting
